trans-unit.source: Implements the cache for a Web application.
This class cannot be inherited.
One instance of this class is created per application domain, and it remains valid as long as the application domain remains active.
trans-unit.target: 建立一個執行個體，這個類別的每個應用程式網域，且只要在應用程式定義域會保持使用中仍有效。

trans-unit.source: Information about an instance of this class is available through the `Cache` property of the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> object or the `Cache` property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page> object.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別的執行個體的資訊是透過`Cache`屬性<xref:System.Web.HttpContext>物件或`Cache`屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.Page>物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Caching.Cache> class is not intended for use outside of ASP.NET applications.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Caching.Cache>類別並不適合用於 ASP.NET 應用程式之外。

trans-unit.source: It was designed and tested for use in ASP.NET to provide caching for Web applications.
trans-unit.target: 它在設計和測試以提供 Web 應用程式的快取的 ASP.NET 中使用。

trans-unit.source: For other types of applications, such as console applications or Windows Forms applications, use the <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.ObjectCache> class.
trans-unit.target: 對於其他類型的應用程式，例如主控台應用程式或 Windows Forms 應用程式，使用<xref:System.Runtime.Caching.ObjectCache>類別。

trans-unit.source: The following example is a page that shows users the value assigned to an item in the cache, and then notifies them when the item is removed from the cache.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例為頁面的值指派給快取中，項目會顯示使用者，並通知它們從快取中移除項目時。

trans-unit.source: It creates a `RemovedCallback` method, which has the signature of the `CacheItemRemovedCallback` delegate, to notify users when the cache item is removed, and it uses the <xref:System.Web.Caching.CacheItemRemovedReason> enumeration to tell them why it was removed.
trans-unit.target: 它會建立`RemovedCallback`方法簽章的`CacheItemRemovedCallback`委派，會移除快取項目，並使用時通知使用者<xref:System.Web.Caching.CacheItemRemovedReason>列舉型別來告知它們為何它已被移除。

trans-unit.source: In addition, it uses the <xref:System.Web.Caching.Cache.Item%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to add objects to the cache and retrieve the value of those objects.
trans-unit.target: 此外，它會使用<xref:System.Web.Caching.Cache.Item%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性，以將物件新增至快取，然後擷取這些物件的值。

trans-unit.source: In the `AddItemToCache` method, it uses the <xref:System.Web.Caching.Cache.Add%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to add an item to the cache.
trans-unit.target: 在`AddItemToCache`方法，它會使用<xref:System.Web.Caching.Cache.Add%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法將項目新增至快取。

trans-unit.source: To use the `CacheItemRemovedCallback` delegate, you must add an item to the cache with this method or the <xref:System.Web.Caching.Cache.Insert%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method, so that that ASP.NET can automatically make the proper method calls when the item is removed.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用`CacheItemRemovedCallback`委派，必須使用此方法將項目加入至快取或<xref:System.Web.Caching.Cache.Insert%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法，因此，ASP.NET 可以自動讓適當的方法呼叫時已移除項目。

trans-unit.source: The custom `RemoveItemFromCache` method uses the <xref:System.Web.Caching.Cache.Remove%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to explicitly delete the item from the cache, causing the `RemovedCallback` method to be invoked.
trans-unit.target: 自訂`RemoveItemFromCache`方法會使用<xref:System.Web.Caching.Cache.Remove%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法明確地刪除的項目從快取，造成`RemovedCallback`方法被叫用。

trans-unit.source: The instance of Cache that is accessed by the snippet below is a member of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page> object that this sample inherits.
trans-unit.target: 存取下列片段所模式化的快取的執行個體是屬於<xref:System.Web.UI.Page>這個範例會繼承的物件。

trans-unit.source: This type is thread safe.
trans-unit.target: 此型別具備執行緒安全。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Caching.Cache" /> class.
The cache key used to reference the item.
The item to be added to the cache.
The file or cache key dependencies for the item.
When any dependency changes, the object becomes invalid and is removed from the cache.
If there are no dependencies, this parameter contains <see langword="null" />.
The time at which the added object expires and is removed from the cache.
If you are using sliding expiration, the <c>absoluteExpiration</c> parameter must be <see cref="F:System.Web.Caching.Cache.NoAbsoluteExpiration" />.
The interval between the time the added object was last accessed and the time at which that object expires.
If this value is the equivalent of 20 minutes, the object expires and is removed from the cache 20 minutes after it is last accessed.
If you are using absolute expiration, the <c>slidingExpiration</c> parameter must be <see cref="F:System.Web.Caching.Cache.NoSlidingExpiration" />.
The relative cost of the object, as expressed by the <see cref="T:System.Web.Caching.CacheItemPriority" /> enumeration.
The cache uses this value when it evicts objects; objects with a lower cost are removed from the cache before objects with a higher cost.
A delegate that, if provided, is called when an object is removed from the cache.
You can use this to notify applications when their objects are deleted from the cache.

Adds the specified item to the <see cref="T:System.Web.Caching.Cache" /> object with dependencies, expiration and priority policies, and a delegate you can use to notify your application when the inserted item is removed from the <see langword="Cache" />.
An object that represents the item that was added if the item was previously stored in the cache; otherwise, <see langword="null" />.
Calls to this method will fail if an item with the same `key` parameter is already stored in the `Cache`.
trans-unit.target: 如果具有相同的項目至這個方法的呼叫將失敗`key`參數已經儲存在`Cache`。

trans-unit.source: To overwrite an existing `Cache` item using the same `key` parameter, use the <xref:System.Web.Caching.Cache.Insert%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要覆寫現有`Cache`使用相同的項目`key`參數，使用<xref:System.Web.Caching.Cache.Insert%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: You cannot set both the `absoluteExpiration` and `slidingExpiration` parameters.
trans-unit.target: 您不能同時設定`absoluteExpiration`和`slidingExpiration`參數。

trans-unit.source: If you intend the cache item to expire at a specific time, you set the `absoluteExpiration` parameter to the specific time, and the `slidingExpiration` parameter to <xref:System.Web.Caching.Cache.NoSlidingExpiration>.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想在特定時間過期的快取項目，設定`absoluteExpiration`參數為特定的時間，而`slidingExpiration`參數<xref:System.Web.Caching.Cache.NoSlidingExpiration>。

trans-unit.source: If you intend the cache item to expire after a certain amount of time has passed since the item was last accessed, you set the `slidingExpiration` parameter to the expiration interval, and the `absoluteExpiration` parameter to <xref:System.Web.Caching.Cache.NoAbsoluteExpiration>.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要快取項目在一段時間之後過期後經過上一次存取項目，則設定`slidingExpiration`到期時間間隔的參數和`absoluteExpiration`參數<xref:System.Web.Caching.Cache.NoAbsoluteExpiration>。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates an `AddItemToCache` method.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會建立`AddItemToCache`方法。

trans-unit.source: When this method is called, it sets an `itemRemoved` property to `false` and registers an `onRemove` method with a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.Caching.CacheItemRemovedCallback> delegate.
trans-unit.target: 當呼叫此方法時，它會設定`itemRemoved`屬性`false`並註冊`onRemove`方法的新執行個體<xref:System.Web.Caching.CacheItemRemovedCallback>委派。

trans-unit.source: The delegate's signature is used in the `RemovedCallback` method.
trans-unit.target: 委派的簽章用於`RemovedCallback`方法。

trans-unit.source: The `AddItemToCache` method then checks the value associated with the `Key1` key in the cache.
trans-unit.target: `AddItemToCache`方法接著會檢查相關聯的值`Key1`快取中的索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: If the value is `null`, the `Add` method places an item in the cache with a key of `Key1`, a value of `Value 1`, an absolute expiration of 60 seconds, and a high cache priority.
trans-unit.target: 如果值為`null`、`Add`方法將項目放在快取索引鍵為`Key1`，值為`Value 1`，絕對期限為 60 秒，而較高的快取的優先順序。

trans-unit.source: It also uses the `onRemove` method as an argument.
trans-unit.target: 它也會使用`onRemove`做為引數的方法。

trans-unit.source: This allows the `RemovedCallback` method to be called when this item is removed from the cache.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓`RemovedCallback`要從快取中移除此項目時呼叫的方法。

trans-unit.source: For examples of how to use the <xref:System.Web.Caching.CacheDependency> class and the <xref:System.Web.Caching.CacheItemRemovedCallback> delegate, see [Caching Application Data](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/206f977d-7860-4d20-bdd5-c3b3d8479f3d).
trans-unit.target: 如需如何使用的範例<xref:System.Web.Caching.CacheDependency>類別和<xref:System.Web.Caching.CacheItemRemovedCallback>委派，請參閱[快取應用程式資料](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/206f977d-7860-4d20-bdd5-c3b3d8479f3d)。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="key" /> or <paramref name="value" /> parameter is set to <see langword="null" />.
The <paramref name="slidingExpiration" /> parameter is set to less than <see langword="TimeSpan.Zero" /> or more than one year.
The <paramref name="absoluteExpiration" /> and <paramref name="slidingExpiration" /> parameters are both set for the item you are trying to add to the <see langword="Cache" />.
Gets the number of items stored in the cache.
The number of items stored in the cache.
trans-unit.target: 快取中所儲存的項目數。

trans-unit.source: This property can be useful when monitoring your application's performance or when using ASP.NET tracing functionality.
trans-unit.target: 監視應用程式的效能時，或使用 ASP.NET 追蹤功能時，這個屬性可以是很有用。

trans-unit.source: The following example obtains the value of the `Count` property, converts it to a string, and assigns the string to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label.Text%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label> Web server control, `Label1`.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會取得的值`Count`屬性，將它轉換為字串，並將指派到字串<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label.Text%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label>Web 伺服器控制項`Label1`。

trans-unit.source: Gets the percentage of physical memory that can be consumed by an application before ASP.NET starts removing items from the cache.
The percentage of physical memory available to the application.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式可用的實體記憶體百分比。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Caching.Cache.EffectivePercentagePhysicalMemoryLimit%2A> property returns the percentage of physical memory that is available to the application.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Caching.Cache.EffectivePercentagePhysicalMemoryLimit%2A>屬性會傳回可用於應用程式的實體記憶體的百分比。

trans-unit.source: When the available percentage becomes low, the cache algorithm begins removing items from the cache.
trans-unit.target: 可用百分比變低時，快取演算法會開始從快取中移除項目。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Caching.Cache.EffectivePercentagePhysicalMemoryLimit%2A> property can be set with the `percentagePhysicalMemoryUsedLimit` attribute of the [cache Element for caching (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/68fa0040-5abf-4c73-93fc-17e3c6af3299) element in the application's configuration file.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Caching.Cache.EffectivePercentagePhysicalMemoryLimit%2A>屬性可以設定與`percentagePhysicalMemoryUsedLimit`屬性[快取項目 （ASP.NET 設定結構描述） 快取](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/68fa0040-5abf-4c73-93fc-17e3c6af3299)應用程式的組態檔中的項目。

trans-unit.source: If the `percentagePhysicalMemoryUsedLimit` attribute is not set, the cache algorithm determines the maximum size of the cache, and the <xref:System.Web.Caching.Cache.EffectivePercentagePhysicalMemoryLimit%2A> property is calculated.
trans-unit.target: 如果`percentagePhysicalMemoryUsedLimit`屬性未設定，快取演算法決定快取的大小上限和<xref:System.Web.Caching.Cache.EffectivePercentagePhysicalMemoryLimit%2A>計算屬性。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.Caching.Cache.EffectivePercentagePhysicalMemoryLimit%2A> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Caching.Cache.EffectivePercentagePhysicalMemoryLimit%2A> .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of bytes available for the cache.
The number of bytes available for the cache.
trans-unit.target: 快取可用的位元組數目。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Caching.Cache.EffectivePrivateBytesLimit%2A> property returns the number of bytes that can be used by the application process.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Caching.Cache.EffectivePrivateBytesLimit%2A>屬性會傳回可由應用程式處理序的位元組數目。

trans-unit.source: Once this limit is reached, the cache algorithm begins aggressively scavenging the cache.
trans-unit.target: 一旦達到此限制時，快取演算法開始積極地清除快取。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Caching.Cache.EffectivePrivateBytesLimit%2A> property can be set with the `privateBytesLimit` attribute of the [cache Element for caching (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/68fa0040-5abf-4c73-93fc-17e3c6af3299) element in the application's configuration file.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Caching.Cache.EffectivePrivateBytesLimit%2A>屬性可以設定與`privateBytesLimit`屬性[快取項目 （ASP.NET 設定結構描述） 快取](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/68fa0040-5abf-4c73-93fc-17e3c6af3299)應用程式的組態檔中的項目。

trans-unit.source: When the `privateBytesLimit` attribute is not set, the cache algorithm determines the maximum size of the cache, and the <xref:System.Web.Caching.Cache.EffectivePrivateBytesLimit%2A> property contains the size chosen by the algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 當`privateBytesLimit`屬性未設定，快取演算法決定快取的大小上限和<xref:System.Web.Caching.Cache.EffectivePrivateBytesLimit%2A>屬性包含演算法所選擇的大小。

trans-unit.source: The identifier for the cache item to retrieve.
Retrieves the specified item from the <see cref="T:System.Web.Caching.Cache" /> object.
The retrieved cache item, or <see langword="null" /> if the key is not found.
The following example demonstrates how to retrieve the value cached for an ASP.NET text box server control.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範如何擷取快取的 ASP.NET 文字方塊伺服器控制項的值。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a dictionary enumerator used to iterate through the key settings and their values contained in the cache.
An enumerator to iterate through the <see cref="T:System.Web.Caching.Cache" /> object.
Items can be added to or removed from the cache while this method is enumerating through the items.
trans-unit.target: 項目可以加入或移除從快取，而這個方法列舉的項目之間。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates an <xref:System.Collections.IDictionaryEnumerator> object, `CacheEnum`, using the `GetEnumerator` method.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會建立<xref:System.Collections.IDictionaryEnumerator>物件`CacheEnum`，並使用`GetEnumerator`方法。

trans-unit.source: The enumerator moves through the cache, converts the value of each cached item to a string, and then writes the values to a Web Forms page.
trans-unit.target: 列舉值會移到快取中，將每個快取項目的值，轉換為字串，並再將值寫入至 Web Form 頁面。

trans-unit.source: Inserts an item into the <see cref="T:System.Web.Caching.Cache" /> object.
Use one of the versions of this method to overwrite an existing <see langword="Cache" /> item with the same <paramref name="key" /> parameter.
The cache key used to reference the item.
The object to be inserted into the cache.

Inserts an item into the <see cref="T:System.Web.Caching.Cache" /> object with a cache key to reference its location, using default values provided by the <see cref="T:System.Web.Caching.CacheItemPriority" /> enumeration.
This method will overwrite an existing cache item whose key matches the `key` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會覆寫現有的快取項目索引鍵符合`key`參數。

trans-unit.source: The object added to the cache using this overload of the `Insert` method is inserted with no file or cache dependencies, a priority of <xref:System.Web.Caching.CacheItemPriority.Default>, a sliding expiration value of <xref:System.Web.Caching.Cache.NoSlidingExpiration>, and an absolute expiration value of <xref:System.Web.Caching.Cache.NoAbsoluteExpiration>.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個多載的快取中加入的物件`Insert`方法已插入不含檔案或快取相依性，優先順序為<xref:System.Web.Caching.CacheItemPriority.Default>、 滑動逾期值<xref:System.Web.Caching.Cache.NoSlidingExpiration>，和絕對逾期值的<xref:System.Web.Caching.Cache.NoAbsoluteExpiration>。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to insert an item into an application's cache.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範如何將項目插入至應用程式的快取。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="key" /> or <paramref name="value" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
The cache key used to identify the item.
The object to be inserted in the cache.
The file or cache key dependencies for the inserted object.
When any dependency changes, the object becomes invalid and is removed from the cache.
If there are no dependencies, this parameter contains <see langword="null" />.
Inserts an object into the <see cref="T:System.Web.Caching.Cache" /> that has file or key dependencies.
This method will overwrite an existing cache item whose key matches the `key` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會覆寫現有的快取項目索引鍵符合`key`參數。

trans-unit.source: The object added to the cache using this overload of the `Insert` method is inserted with no file or cache dependencies, a priority of <xref:System.Web.Caching.CacheItemPriority.Default>, a sliding expiration value of <xref:System.Web.Caching.Cache.NoSlidingExpiration>, and an absolute expiration value of <xref:System.Web.Caching.Cache.NoAbsoluteExpiration>.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個多載的快取中加入的物件`Insert`方法已插入不含檔案或快取相依性，優先順序為<xref:System.Web.Caching.CacheItemPriority.Default>、 滑動逾期值<xref:System.Web.Caching.Cache.NoSlidingExpiration>，和絕對逾期值的<xref:System.Web.Caching.Cache.NoAbsoluteExpiration>。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to insert an item into an application's cache with a cache dependency on an XML configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範如何將項目插入快取相依性的 XML 設定檔的應用程式的快取。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="key" /> or <paramref name="value" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
The cache key used to reference the object.
The object to be inserted in the cache.
The file or cache key dependencies for the inserted object.
When any dependency changes, the object becomes invalid and is removed from the cache.
If there are no dependencies, this parameter contains <see langword="null" />.
The time at which the inserted object expires and is removed from the cache.

To avoid possible issues with local time such as changes from standard time to daylight saving time, use <see cref="P:System.DateTime.UtcNow" /> rather than <see cref="P:System.DateTime.Now" /> for this parameter value.
If you are using absolute expiration, the <c>slidingExpiration</c> parameter must be <see cref="F:System.Web.Caching.Cache.NoSlidingExpiration" />.
The interval between the time the inserted object is last accessed and the time at which that object expires.
If this value is the equivalent of 20 minutes, the object will expire and be removed from the cache 20 minutes after it was last accessed.
If you are using sliding expiration, the <c>absoluteExpiration</c> parameter must be <see cref="F:System.Web.Caching.Cache.NoAbsoluteExpiration" />.
Inserts an object into the <see cref="T:System.Web.Caching.Cache" /> with dependencies and expiration policies.
This method will overwrite an existing `Cache` item with the same `key` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法將覆寫現有`Cache`具有相同的項目`key`參數。

trans-unit.source: If the `slidingExpiration` parameter is set to <xref:System.Web.Caching.Cache.NoSlidingExpiration>, sliding expiration is disabled.
trans-unit.target: 如果`slidingExpiration`參數設定為<xref:System.Web.Caching.Cache.NoSlidingExpiration>，滑動期限會停用。

trans-unit.source: If you set the `slidingExpiration` parameter to greater than <xref:System.TimeSpan.Zero>, the `absoluteExpiration` parameter is set to <xref:System.DateTime.Now%2A> plus the value contained in the `slidingExpiration` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 如果您設定`slidingExpiration`參數大於<xref:System.TimeSpan.Zero>、`absoluteExpiration`參數設定為<xref:System.DateTime.Now%2A>中包含的值加`slidingExpiration`參數。

trans-unit.source: If the item is requested from the cache before the amount of time specified by the `absoluteExpiration` parameter, the item will be placed in the cache again, and `absoluteExpiration` will again be set to `DateTime.Now` plus the value contained in the `slidingExpiration` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 如果項目會從快取要求之前所指定的時間量`absoluteExpiration`參數，此項目將會放置於快取，和`absoluteExpiration`再次設定為`DateTime.Now`中包含的值加`slidingExpiration`參數。

trans-unit.source: If the item is not requested from the cache before the date in the `absoluteExpiration` parameter, the item is removed from the cache.
trans-unit.target: 如果項目未要求從快取中的日期之前`absoluteExpiration`參數，此項目會從快取移除。

trans-unit.source: The item added to the cache using this overload of the insert method is inserted with a priority of <xref:System.Web.Caching.CacheItemPriority.Default>.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個方法多載，插入快取中加入的項目會插入優先順序為<xref:System.Web.Caching.CacheItemPriority.Default>。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to insert an item into an application's cache with an absolute expiration.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範如何將項目插入快取的應用程式絕對期限。

trans-unit.source: Since this form of the `Insert` method supports cache dependencies, if the item has no dependencies, you must declare the `dependency` parameter as `null` (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) in the comma-delimited list of parameters.
trans-unit.target: 這種形式的自`Insert`方法支援快取相依性，如果此項目沒有任何相依性，您必須宣告`dependency`參數做為`null`(`Nothing`在 Visual Basic 中) 以逗號分隔清單中的參數。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to insert an item into the cache with a sliding expiration.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範如何將項目插入快取使用滑動期限。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="key" /> or <paramref name="value" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
You set the <paramref name="slidingExpiration" /> parameter to less than <see langword="TimeSpan.Zero" /> or the equivalent of more than one year.
The <paramref name="absoluteExpiration" /> and <paramref name="slidingExpiration" /> parameters are both set for the item you are trying to add to the <see langword="Cache" />.
The cache key that is used to reference the object.
The object to insert into the cache.
The file or cache key dependencies for the item.
When any dependency changes, the object becomes invalid and is removed from the cache.
If there are no dependencies, this parameter contains <see langword="null" />.
The time at which the inserted object expires and is removed from the cache.

To avoid possible issues with local time such as changes from standard time to daylight saving time, use <see cref="P:System.DateTime.UtcNow" /> instead of <see cref="P:System.DateTime.Now" /> for this parameter value.
If you are using absolute expiration, the <c>slidingExpiration</c> parameter must be set to <see cref="F:System.Web.Caching.Cache.NoSlidingExpiration" />.
The interval between the time that the cached object was last accessed and the time at which that object expires.
If this value is the equivalent of 20 minutes, the object will expire and be removed from the cache 20 minutes after it was last accessed.
If you are using sliding expiration, the <c>absoluteExpiration</c> parameter must be set to <see cref="F:System.Web.Caching.Cache.NoAbsoluteExpiration" />.
A delegate that will be called before the object is removed from the cache.
You can use this to update the cached item and ensure that it is not removed from the cache.

Inserts an object into the <see cref="T:System.Web.Caching.Cache" /> object together with dependencies, expiration policies, and a delegate that you can use to notify the application before the item is removed from the cache.
The <xref:System.Web.Caching.Cache.Insert%2A> method enables you to insert a new item in the cache and provide a delegate that is called before the item is removed from the cache.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Caching.Cache.Insert%2A>方法可讓您快取中插入新項目，並提供從快取移除項目之前呼叫的委派。

trans-unit.source: In the delegate, you can update the cached item and thereby prevent it from being removed from the cache.
trans-unit.target: 在委派中，您可以更新快取的項目，並藉此防止它正在從快取中移除。

trans-unit.source: This method will overwrite an existing `Cache` item with the same `key` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法將覆寫現有`Cache`具有相同的項目`key`參數。

trans-unit.source: You cannot set both the `absoluteExpiration` and `slidingExpiration` parameters.
trans-unit.target: 您不能同時設定`absoluteExpiration`和`slidingExpiration`參數。

trans-unit.source: If you intend the cache item to expire at a specific time, you set the `absoluteExpiration` parameter to the specific time, and the `slidingExpiration` parameter to <xref:System.Web.Caching.Cache.NoSlidingExpiration>.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想在特定時間過期的快取項目，設定`absoluteExpiration`參數為特定的時間，而`slidingExpiration`參數<xref:System.Web.Caching.Cache.NoSlidingExpiration>。

trans-unit.source: If you intend the cache item to expire after a set period of time since the item was last accessed, you set the `slidingExpiration` parameter to the expiration interval, and you set the `absoluteExpiration` parameter to <xref:System.Web.Caching.Cache.NoAbsoluteExpiration>.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要快取項目來設定項目之後的時間週期之後過期一次被存取，則設定`slidingExpiration`參數的到期間隔，以及您要設定`absoluteExpiration`參數<xref:System.Web.Caching.Cache.NoAbsoluteExpiration>。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="key" />, <paramref name="value" />, or <paramref name="onUpdateCallback" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
You set the <paramref name="slidingExpiration" /> parameter to less than <see langword="TimeSpan.Zero" /> or the equivalent of more than one year.
The <paramref name="absoluteExpiration" /> and <paramref name="slidingExpiration" /> parameters are both set for the item you are trying to add to the <see langword="Cache" />.
-or-

The <paramref name="dependencies" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />, and the <paramref name="absoluteExpiration" /> parameter is set to <see cref="F:System.Web.Caching.Cache.NoAbsoluteExpiration" />, and the <paramref name="slidingExpiration" /> parameter is set to <see cref="F:System.Web.Caching.Cache.NoSlidingExpiration" />.
The cache key used to reference the object.
The object to be inserted in the cache.
The file or cache key dependencies for the item.
When any dependency changes, the object becomes invalid and is removed from the cache.
If there are no dependencies, this parameter contains <see langword="null" />.
The time at which the inserted object expires and is removed from the cache.

To avoid possible issues with local time such as changes from standard time to daylight saving time, use <see cref="P:System.DateTime.UtcNow" /> rather than <see cref="P:System.DateTime.Now" /> for this parameter value.
If you are using absolute expiration, the <c>slidingExpiration</c> parameter must be <see cref="F:System.Web.Caching.Cache.NoSlidingExpiration" />.
The interval between the time the inserted object was last accessed and the time at which that object expires.
If this value is the equivalent of 20 minutes, the object will expire and be removed from the cache 20 minutes after it was last accessed.
If you are using sliding expiration, the <c>absoluteExpiration</c> parameter must be <see cref="F:System.Web.Caching.Cache.NoAbsoluteExpiration" />.
The cost of the object relative to other items stored in the cache, as expressed by the <see cref="T:System.Web.Caching.CacheItemPriority" /> enumeration.
This value is used by the cache when it evicts objects; objects with a lower cost are removed from the cache before objects with a higher cost.
A delegate that, if provided, will be called when an object is removed from the cache.
You can use this to notify applications when their objects are deleted from the cache.

Inserts an object into the <see cref="T:System.Web.Caching.Cache" /> object with dependencies, expiration and priority policies, and a delegate you can use to notify your application when the inserted item is removed from the <see langword="Cache" />.
This method will overwrite an existing `Cache` item with the same `key` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法將覆寫現有`Cache`具有相同的項目`key`參數。

trans-unit.source: You cannot set both the `absoluteExpiration` and `slidingExpiration` parameters.
trans-unit.target: 您不能同時設定`absoluteExpiration`和`slidingExpiration`參數。

trans-unit.source: If you intend the cache item to expire at a specific time, you set the `absoluteExpiration` parameter to the specific time, and the `slidingExpiration` parameter to <xref:System.Web.Caching.Cache.NoSlidingExpiration>.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想在特定時間過期的快取項目，設定`absoluteExpiration`參數為特定的時間，而`slidingExpiration`參數<xref:System.Web.Caching.Cache.NoSlidingExpiration>。

trans-unit.source: If you intend the cache item to expire after a certain amount of time has passed since the last access to the item, you set the `slidingExpiration` parameter to the expiration interval, and the `absoluteExpiration` parameter to <xref:System.Web.Caching.Cache.NoAbsoluteExpiration>.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要快取項目在一段時間之後過期，已經過一次存取項目，您設定`slidingExpiration`到期時間間隔的參數和`absoluteExpiration`參數<xref:System.Web.Caching.Cache.NoAbsoluteExpiration>。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to assign an item high priority when you insert it into your application's `Cache` object.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何插入您的應用程式時，指派項目高優先權`Cache`物件。

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to use this method with the <xref:System.Web.Caching.CacheItemRemovedCallback> delegate, see [How to: Notify an Application When an Item Is Removed from the Cache](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/38c33aa0-afe9-40ba-a1a4-1ebab95286ef).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關如何使用這個方法與<xref:System.Web.Caching.CacheItemRemovedCallback>委派，請參閱[How to： 通知應用程式時移除項目是從快取](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/38c33aa0-afe9-40ba-a1a4-1ebab95286ef)。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="key" /> or <paramref name="value" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
You set the <paramref name="slidingExpiration" /> parameter to less than <see langword="TimeSpan.Zero" /> or the equivalent of more than one year.
The <paramref name="absoluteExpiration" /> and <paramref name="slidingExpiration" /> parameters are both set for the item you are trying to add to the <see langword="Cache" />.
A <see cref="T:System.String" /> object that represents the key for the cache item.
Gets or sets the cache item at the specified key.
The specified cache item.
trans-unit.target: 指定的快取項目。

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to retrieve the value of a specified cache item, or to add an item and a key for it to the cache.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個屬性，擷取指定的快取項目值，或將項目和索引鍵為其新增至快取。

trans-unit.source: Adding a cache item using the <xref:System.Web.Caching.Cache.Item%2A> property is equivalent to calling the <xref:System.Web.Caching.Cache.Insert%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 加入快取項目使用<xref:System.Web.Caching.Cache.Item%2A>屬性就相當於呼叫<xref:System.Web.Caching.Cache.Insert%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the `Item` property to retrieve the value of a cached object associated with the `Key1` key.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會使用`Item`屬性，以擷取快取的物件相關聯的值`Key1`索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: It then uses the <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.Write%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to write the value and introductory text and the B HTML element to a Web Forms page.
trans-unit.target: 然後它會使用<xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.Write%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法，將寫入 Web Form 網頁上的值和簡介文字和 B HTML 項目。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates using this property to insert the value of a text box into the cache.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範使用此屬性的文字方塊中的值插入快取。

trans-unit.source: Used in the <paramref name="absoluteExpiration" /> parameter in an <see cref="M:System.Web.Caching.Cache.Insert(System.String,System.Object)" /> method call to indicate the item should never expire.
This field is read-only.
When used, this field sets the `absoluteExpiration` parameter equal to <xref:System.DateTime.MaxValue>, which is a constant representing the largest possible `DateTime` value, 12/31/9999 11:59:59 PM.
trans-unit.target: 使用時，此欄位會設定`absoluteExpiration`參數等於<xref:System.DateTime.MaxValue>，它是一個常數代表最大可能`DateTime`值 12/31/9999 11:59:59 PM。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the `NoAbsoluteExpiration` field to disable absolute expirations when inserting an item in the `Cache`.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用`NoAbsoluteExpiration`插入中的項目時，停用絕對到期日欄位`Cache`。

trans-unit.source: Used as the <paramref name="slidingExpiration" /> parameter in an <see cref="M:System.Web.Caching.Cache.Insert(System.String,System.Object)" /> or <see cref="M:System.Web.Caching.Cache.Add(System.String,System.Object,System.Web.Caching.CacheDependency,System.DateTime,System.TimeSpan,System.Web.Caching.CacheItemPriority,System.Web.Caching.CacheItemRemovedCallback)" /> method call to disable sliding expirations.
This field is read-only.
When used, this field sets the `slidingExpiration` parameter to the <xref:System.TimeSpan.Zero?displayProperty=nameWithType> field, which has a constant value of zero.
trans-unit.target: 使用時，此欄位會設定`slidingExpiration`參數<xref:System.TimeSpan.Zero?displayProperty=nameWithType>欄位有常數值為零。

trans-unit.source: The cached item expires in accordance with the `absoluteExpiration` parameter associated with the `Insert` or `Add` method call.
trans-unit.target: 按照所使用的快取的項目到期`absoluteExpiration`參數相關聯`Insert`或`Add`方法呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the Insert method to add an item to the <xref:System.Web.Caching.Cache> object using the `NoSlidingExpiration` field.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用 Insert 方法，將項目加入<xref:System.Web.Caching.Cache>物件使用`NoSlidingExpiration`欄位。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> identifier for the cache item to remove.
Removes the specified item from the application's <see cref="T:System.Web.Caching.Cache" /> object.
The item removed from the <see langword="Cache" />.
If the value in the key parameter is not found, returns <see langword="null" />.
The following example creates a `RemoveItemFromCache` method.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會建立`RemoveItemFromCache`方法。

trans-unit.source: When this method is called, it uses the <xref:System.Web.Caching.Cache.Item%2A> property to check whether the cache contains an object that is associated with a `Key1` key value.
trans-unit.target: 當呼叫此方法時，它會使用<xref:System.Web.Caching.Cache.Item%2A>檢查快取是否包含物件相關聯的屬性`Key1`機碼值。

trans-unit.source: If it does, the `Remove` method is called to remove the object.
trans-unit.target: 若是如此，`Remove`呼叫方法來移除該物件。

trans-unit.source: Returns an enumerator that can iterate through the <see cref="T:System.Web.Caching.Cache" /> object collection.
An enumerator that can iterate through the <see cref="T:System.Web.Caching.Cache" /> object collection.
